long_description: A tough bike that you can take off road on urban shortcuts or gravel trails, the Cannondale Quick CX4 puts you in an upright riding position for confident steering and comfort. Aluminum frame uses Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology to damp road vibration for a smooth ride. 24-speed drivetrain with Shimano components offers up plenty of smooth-shifting gear combinations to power you up, over and down any terrain you may encounter. Cannondale mechancical disc brakes deliver all-weather stopping power. Kenda Happy Medium tires have a fast-rolling center with aggressive outside lugs for cornering. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required. Eyelets accept fenders or a rear rack (not included). Specs on the Cannondale Quick CX 4 bike are subject to change.
